author: danhaywood
msg: Renamed PersistorUtil#startStateTransition -> #startResolving (since only ever called with Resolving state)
Simplified SQL OS internals, removing the "markAsResolved" boolean in various methods since is always set to true
Put calls to PersistorUtil#start/end in try...finally block since should be 'transactional'.

author: cframpton
msg: Make sure all the framework projects with bundles directories also have en_US directories so that copylocale works in a built src distribution as well.

author: danhaywood
msg: Moving the place where the determination of the target ResolveState is further down the stack;
also, assumed that the adapter being rehydrated is not in a NEW state (think this is safe to assume).

author: danhaywood
msg: Changing the Memento rehydration logic, to see if can resolve aggregated adapters to RESOLVING (like everywhere else) instead of GHOST.  Seems to work (no tests fail...)

author: danhaywood
msg: Renamed ResolveState#representsTransient -> #isTransient (since there is now only one such state)
Working towards removing ResolveState from the ObjectAdapter API: Introduced aggregateResolveState as non-API method for PojoAdapter,
Removed ResolveState from Data hierarchy (memento), since apparently not required.
